data.text: #DidYouKnow that on January 1st, 2022 airBaltic will fully take over its passenger handling at Riga Airport, ensuring a seamless customer service? https://t.co/iT2Mpl7qnT
@Inga_Gorbunova Informējam, ka šis process ir īslaicīgs un mājas lapas darbība tiks atjaunota tuvākajā laikā. Paldies.

@Inga_Gorbunova Labdien, Inga! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Informējam, ka šobrīd mājas lapā tiek veikti nelieli tehniski uzlabojumi. Aicinām veikt biļešu rezervāciju mazliet vēlāk, vai sazināties ar mūsu Rezervāciju departamentu. Atvainojamies par sagādātajām neērtībām un pateicamies par sapratni.

@HannahLucyLucy Hello! Please be informed that it may take up to few working days for processing a written request as they are being reviewed in the incoming order. For immediate assistance, we kindly invite you to contact us by calling: https://t.co/UWa844vRzD
Thank you for understanding.

urls.title: Frequently asked question about airBaltic
urls.description: We're here to help you! Helpful answers to your questions and useful contacts to find out everything you need about your flight.

data.text:
Our Green Sale is here! It's time to book your dream skiing holiday or plan a sunny winter break now cause flights to all airBaltic destinations are available at their lowest prices: https://t.co/oThLKZotNy
Book 💻 05.10.2021. - 19.10.2021.
Travel ✈️ 25.10.2021. - 26.03.2022. https://t.co/Xcgq1B0EJ5

data.text: Sending a chef’s kiss to everyone who got it right! 😙 Passengers love to order sweet & sour chicken with rice! It’s the most popular among the meals, be sure to check it out on your next flight! 💚

data.text: The latest Baltic Outlook issue will take you to Barcelona, a city with an irresistible mix of urban pace and relaxed Mediterranean vibes. Discover things locals love about their own city, and read many more exciting articles while on board: https://t.co/fXqBzSDs9m https://t.co/8ohD1YEHDh
@EdgarsTurlajs Labdien, Edgar! Paldies par Jūsu jautājumu. Informējam, ka šādā gadījumā varat doties uz drošības pārbaudi. Dokumenti tiek pārbaudīti pirms iekāpšanas reisā. Paldies.

@androns Labdien, Andri! Informējam, ka minētais rīks izveidots kā papildus palīgs dokumentu pārbaudei. Taču aicinām ņemt vērā, ka pasažieri var tikt aicināti uzrādīt dokumentus jebkurā ceļošanas posmā gan izlidojot, gan sasniedzot galamērķi. 😊 Pateicamies par sapratni!
@joshualeclair1 Hi Joshua! The aircraft reached Riga International Airport last night.

On October 1, we welcomed our 32nd @Airbus A220-300, registered as YL-ABF. It’s the 7th and final aircraft delivery for us in 2021, making us the largest A220-300 operator in the world and the largest A220 operator in Europe. https://t.co/568CZIQPKO

data.text: It has been 26 years since airBaltic is in the sky, connecting Baltics to the world! May this birthday month be happy and exciting for both our passengers and us! 💚 https://t.co/XdIPppWC62

@santa_be Labdien, Santa! Atvainojamies par tehniskajām problēmām ar mūsu mājas lapu. Ar mūsu aģentiem iespējams sazināties, izmantojot e-pasta adresi reservations@airbaltic.com. Varam ieteikt maksājuma pieprasījumu veikt arī mūsu mājas lapā: https://t.co/7sGi8cThRt

data.text: @Nor_Man_Is Saņēmām ziņu no kolēģiem, ka šajā konkrētajā gadījumā sistēma nav atpazinusi pievienoto dokumentu, jo konstatēta vārdu nesakritība. Aicinām rūpīgi pārbaudīt augšuplādējamā dokumenta piederību personai, kura norādīta rezervācijā. Arī latviskie uzvārdi tiek validēti. 😊 Paldies.
@Nor_Man_Is Labdien, Normund! Pateicamies par Jūsu ziņu un detaļām. Nodosim šo informāciju (ar konkrētajiem piemēriem) mūsu kolēģiem sīkākai izmeklēšanai. Paldies.

Save the time at the airport and travel with ease ⌚ With our new automatic system, you can breeze through the Covid-19 document check already during the online check-in process. The new feature is offered for airBaltic passengers traveling on direct flights to Riga. https://t.co/vbs1mC1Xvn

data.text: @EgilsTurks Labrīt! Paldies par jautājumu. Šie kontakti ir biļešu ofisam Atēnās, kas pārdod mūsu biļetes - airBaltic filiāle tā nav. Nodosim kolēģiem, lai tie tiek pārbaudīti. Attiecībā uz Jūsu jautājumu, sazināsimies ar konkrēto lidostu un sniegsim atbildi tiklīdz tāda būs mūsu rīcībā.

Fly to the all-time favourite tourist destination with @airBaltic! ✈️
As of September 27, we are excited to offer new direct flights on the route between Riga and Dubai. Flights between the two cities are planned to be performed four times a week: https://t.co/SCtr06P6yn https://t.co/EkdtS7yv2g
Happy World Tourism Day to all travelers and explorers whose hearts fly to explore new destinations and sights! 💚 https://t.co/aAXJP14Q8d
@MikelisDz Jā, mūsu paplašinātais ēdienkartes piedāvājums ir atrodams https://t.co/2MhNoEEHAF mājaslapā!
@drareg59 😎🌞

Yes, yes and yes! Newest destination Kittilä is full of winter charm - holding record for the lowest temperature in Finland, having polar nights in December and let’s not forget the amazing view of Northern lights! ❄️✨
Be sure to check out the direct flights on our website! ✈️
@MikelisDz Labrīt! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Piedāvājam tādas jau ilgāku laiku: https://t.co/r0mWHImCaY
@kukreti1 Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Please check your private messages as we have already replied there! Thanks!

@GlenAshworth Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. Our apologies for the technical issues. May we kindly ask you to share with us via DM more details, for example, screenshots of the error you’re experiencing? We’d be glad to assist!

@BrijeshsinghAgr Hello! Thanks for reaching out to us. We are sorry to hear about the inconveniences. May we kindly ask you to share more details in regards to your booking (such as - flight number and route, passenger names, e-mail used for the said booking) by writing us a DM? We will check! 😊

Let’s get down to quizness #airBalticQuiz! With the temperatures dropping, dare to daydream about winter vacation! ⛷
Yesterday we announced new winter destination Kittilä in Finland. Do you know which of these statements are true about the region? ❄️

@giappolo Hello! Thanks for the question. It depends on the country to which you are travelling and what are the current entry requirements there. If no tests or Covid certificates are needed - we won't ask for them. Please note you still need a valid ID card or passport to travel.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: We are happy to announce that as of now four self-service baggage drop-off points are open at @riga_airport for our passenger convenience. If you have already checked in for a flight and received a boarding pass, you can easily drop off your checked baggage. https://t.co/8N7s7Kr1LY

@l_jenca Labdien! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Pasažierus vienas rezervācijas ietvaros sistēma parasti sēdina kopā, tāpēc atvainojamies par radušos situāciju. Vai varam lūgt precizēt Jūsu jautājumu - vai sēdvietas jau lūdzāt mainīt lidostā konkrētās rezervācijas sakarā?
@ritaignate Esam sazinājušies ar atbildīgo departamentu sīkāku detaļu noskaidrošanai. Kolīdz saņemsim atbildi, mēs Jūs informēsim. Paldies.

@ritaignate Labdien, Rita! Paldies par Jūsu ziņu. Aicinām turpināt saraksti, sazinoties ar mums privāti. Atgādinām, ka publiski dalītes ar tādu informāciju kā konkrētās lietas, vai rezervācijas numuru, vai citu sensitīvu informāciju  saistībā ar Jūsu rezervāciju nav ieteicams. Paldies.

A father is someone who will lead your life's journey through sunshine and storms. Happy Father's Day to all dads who are the wise, strong, and caring captains of their families! 💚 https://t.co/qFjmQyMHQy

data.text:
Hi! This week #airBalticQuiz is about our route network 🌍
Currently we offer more than 70 destinations for our passengers and some of these countries simply make you daydream about vacations! 😴 🏖
For which country we offer 8 different destinations from Riga?
@dita_plepa Pateicamies par jaukajiem vārdiem! Priecāsimies Jūs sveikt mūsu lidojumos arī turpmāk! 💚

Nearly five years ago we were the launch operator of @Airbus A220-300, and until today we've grown into the largest A220-300 operator in the world. Learn more of this success story shared by @airBaltic President & CEO @Gaussm. https://t.co/NpQrjEQLyl

data.text: @l_jenca Varam informēt, ka mūsu līnijas ir pieejamas, taču dažos brīžos var būt aizņemtas palīdzot visiem mūsu pasažieriem. Ja par bagāžu nav iespējams samaksāt caur sadaļu "Mana Rezervācija", varam aicināt izmantot tiešsaistes maksājuma formu: https://t.co/7sGi8cThRt, vai zvanot mums.

urls.title: Veikt maksājumu | Papildpakalpojumi | airBaltic
urls.description: Izmanto šo formu, lai pieteiktu lidojumu datuma maiņu, pasažieru vārdu maiņu, pievienotu bagāžu, sporta ekipējumu vai maltīti uz klāja, pieteiktu pavadoņa pakalpojumu vai rezervētu biļeti mājdzīvniekam.

data.text: @l_jenca Labdien! Atvainojamies par tehniskajām problēmām. Visiem pasažieriem ar aktīvām rezervācijām ir pieejams arī parastā tarifa tālruņa numurs, kurš atrodams Jūsu rezervācijas apstiprinājuma e-pastā.

With each passing month we see that the demand for travel continues to grow. During August 2021, @airBaltic has carried 280 800 passengers – 104% more than in the same period last year and 34% more than July 2021. Read more: https://t.co/x2Ng46HFfZ https://t.co/f82Zn4VJnC

data.text: @JJMeijerink Thanks for clarifying. For the actual prices as well as special offers we kindly invite you to visit our web page https://t.co/GfcUoxzmDg! :) Thank you.

urls.title: Cheap flights to Baltics, Europe & Middle East | airBaltic
urls.description: Buy cheap flights to the Baltics, Middle East and Europe online today from airBaltic. We fly to 70+ destinations from Riga, Vilnius and Tallinn.

data.text: @JJMeijerink Hello! May we kindly ask you to clarify your question? Thank you.

Today at 13:32 our CEO @Gaussm will be joining @CAPA_Aviation to discuss airBaltic experience operating in 2021 and to share the company’s future outlook. Register and listen to the #CAPALive virtual event here: https://t.co/KhHwOfMdyo https://t.co/Mc4RkvlJng

#DidYouKnow that the quality of cabin air on our @Airbus A220 – 300 aircraft is carefully controlled and is recirculated with ventilation rates that provide a total change of air 20 - 30 times per hour? https://t.co/43IGrAezlT

data.text: @Steven58344086 Good morning! We are still finalising our summer 2022 schedule therefore there should be updates in this regard in the upcoming months. We thank for your patience!

Take a look at our first flight to the idyllic island of Tenerife that offers diverse leisure options for both holidaymakers and explorers. As of September, this dream destination is one direct flight away from Riga, available three times per week ✈️ https://t.co/nbF21DQky6 https://t.co/dFcRIXAdJe

Thank you for participating! Tenerife is indeed our longest (and furthest) flight….for now 😏 
The ✈️ takes 6 hours 40 minutes and travels 4511 km, but do not worry - times flies when you’re on board with us!

We believe the best vacations start with flying @Airbus A220-300! 💚 We're proud our fleet consists solely of this aircraft type. Take a virtual tour, and learn more about one of the world’s greenest commercial aircraft in the sky: https://t.co/iXyWckM88H https://t.co/3KoNcwNqLl

data.text: @murphtothesky Unfortunately not, however we have some raffles from time to time on social media where you can take part: https://t.co/8wqY8vy56Y
@murphtothesky Wonderful! 💚

Happy Friday! #airBalticQuiz is here and so are our flights to Tenerife! Yesterday we had our first flight and let us tell you - it was magical! 🌴✨
True of false that it is currently the longest route we are performing?

data.text: @koutchoukalimar Good morning! Thanks for your tweet. We will pass this to the responsible teams!
@ZabersZintis Labvakar! Atvainojamies par piedāvāto iespēju “ceļot laikā”! Vai varam lūgt privāti DM ziņā Jūsu rezervācijas numuru? Nodosim šo gadījumu izmeklēšanai mūsu tehniskajai komandai!

Ar prieku paziņojam, ka no 2. septembra esam sākuši lidojumus uz idillisko un ar brīnišķu dabu apveltīto Tenerifi. Dodies kopā ar mums baudīt sauli un karstas pludmales visu ziemas sezonu: https://t.co/ZPdRAYEpVD https://t.co/raM5DRzoFq
@CaherShane Hello, Shane. Please DM us privately more details about your reservation (such as booking reference) as well as screenshot with the error message you see, we will check!
